name: Notebook Jam
description:
Flip through the pages of the Notebook World; by hitting the space bar, you'll turn the page, completely changing your surroundings! You'll learn to be a paper master as you progress through 4 different notebooks, each with their own tricks. Find enough paperclips and you'll even be able to visit the bonus book, which hosts some special stages that you'll want to see! Have fun, and don't lose your way!

Link to the full soundtrack:

https://commanderjersey.bandcamp.com/album/notebook-jamming
